typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		submission_date as string,
		state as string,
		tot_cases as string,
		new_case as string,
		pnew_case as string,
		tot_death as string,
		new_death as string,
		pnew_death as string,
		created_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> extractdailycases
extractdailycases select(mapColumn(
		submission_date,
		state_code = state,
		tot_cases,
		new_case,
		pnew_case,
		tot_death,
		new_death,
		pnew_death,
		created_at
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicatesAndRename
RemoveDuplicatesAndRename derive(rowkey = md5(concat(submission_date,state_code))) ~> AddRowKey
